attributes.action: To Legislate MPs Expenditure - without the right to vote on said Legislation in the House
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today we saw a completely ludicrous situation where MPs were allowed to vote on their own expenses system.

It is time that MPs began living in the clear and transparent era.

Being an MP has responsibilities - one of them being the amount of money they spend from the public purse.

It is about time they suffered as those who voted them in are suffering from the continual rise in cost of staple items, whilst pay rises remain woefully low and way under actual inflation.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
